name: Care for Cassie
text:
Give to the Scott Lang player.
You may flip to alter-ego form. Choose: ·Exhaust Scott Lang → remove Care for Cassie form the game.
·Choose and discard 1 card from your hand. You cannot change form until your next turn ends. Discard this obligation.

flavor: Yellowjacket has stolen priceless Pym Particle technology.
name: Tech Theft
text: Treat the printed text box of each Tech player card as if it were blank.

name: Yellowjacket
text: While you are in Giant hero form, Yellowjacket gains the Giant trait and retaliate 1. While yoy are in Tiny hero form, Yellowjacket gains the Tiny trait and gets +1 ATK. (Ant-Man's nemesis minion.)

attack_text: Forced Response: After attached enemy activates, remove 1 size counter from here.
name: Size Increase
scheme_text: Forced Response: After attached enemy activates, remove 1 size counter from here.
text:
Attach to Yellowjacket, if able. If you cannot, attach to the villain.
Uses (3 counters).

name: Yellowjacket's Plan
text: When Revealed: Discard cards from the encounter deck until a card from the Ant-Man Nemesis set is discarded this way. Reveal that card.
flavor: "You think you can stop the future?!" - Yellowjacket
